com.facebook.buck.jvm.java.plugin.api

Interface BuckJavacTaskListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskListenerProxy, TracingTaskListener

    public interface BuckJavacTaskListener
    Listens to events coming from the Java compiler. This is analogous to TaskListener, but loads in Buck's ClassLoader instead of the compiler's.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods
